preprints.title: Commit-First Event Substrates for Probabilistic Decision Systems
preprints.summary: How a commit-first event substrate (CEB) binds authority, time, and action before probabilistic systems run so we can replay, audit, and govern what happened.

blog.title: Local-first governed observers
blog.summary: Notes on how we design observer surfaces so teams can review traces, lineage, and epistemic envelopes without shipping data off the box.
